definition[0]: to make someone feel that they cannot think clearly or do not understand
example[0]: I understand the text but the diagrams are confusing me.
definition[1]: to think wrongly that a person or thing is someone or something else
example[1]: People might well confuse the two products.
example[2]: I always confuse you with your sister â€“ you look so alike.
example[3]: Donald Regan, not to be confused with former President Ronald Reagan
